Address.label: Address
Address.value: GATE NO. 4, GODREJ & BOYCE COMPLEX,PLANT NO. 10/11, PIROJSHANAGAR, MUMBAI, 400 079, India

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: WNS (Holdings) Ltd is a Global provider of business process management (BPM) services, offering comprehensive data, voice, analytical and business transformation services with a blended onshore, nearshore and offshore delivery model. The company has two reportable segments namely WNS Global BPM and WNS Auto Claims BPM. It generates maximum revenue from WNS Global BPM segment. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from the USA and also has a presence in the UK, Australia, Europe, South Africa and Rest of the world.

value.name: Keshav R. Murugesh
value.title: Group Chief Executive Officer & Executive Director
